sourcesContent:
// import React, { Component } from 'react' import React from 'react' import './Crypto.css' import LineGraph from './LineGraph' import MyHoldings from './MyHoldings' export class TradeCrypto extends React.Component { displayMyHoldings = () => { const foundPorfolioCoin = this.props.portfolioData.coins.find(p=> p.coin_id === this.props.crypto.id) if(typeof foundPorfolioCoin != "undefined") return } render() { const portfolioData = this.props.portfolioData // const foundPorfolioCoin = portfolioData.coins.find(p=> p.coin_id === this.props.crypto.id) const {id, coin_id, symbol, name, image, current_price, market_cap, market_cap_rank, total_volume, high_24h, low_24h, price_change_24h, price_change_percentage_24h, market_cap_change_24h, market_cap_change_percentage_24h, circulating_supply, total_supply, price_change_percentage_1h_in_currency, average_cost, quantity, total_value, total_return, total_return_percentage} = this.props.crypto return ( <>
{/*

Buying Power: ${(current_portfolio.current_balance * 1).toFixed(2)}

*/}

{name} ({symbol.toUpperCase()}) ${current_price}

{Number(price_change_percentage_24h).toFixed(2)}%

Market Cap Rank: #{market_cap_rank}

Trading Volume: ${total_volume}

24h Low/24h High: ${low_24h}/${high_24h}

Market Cap: ${market_cap}

Circulating Supply: {circulating_supply}

Price Change 24h: ${price_change_24h}

Market Cap Change 24h: ${market_cap_change_24h} ({Number(market_cap_change_percentage_24h).toFixed(2)}%)

Total Supply: {total_supply}

Price Change Percentage 1h: {Number(price_change_percentage_1h_in_currency).toFixed(2)}%

Buying Power: ${portfolioData.buying_power}

{this.displayMyHoldings()}

You can buy up to {Number(portfolioData.buying_power/current_price).toPrecision(2)} {name} coins.

Trade





Total:

) } } export default TradeCrypto
